job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
A Fintech company in the financial services industry is looking for 3 Machine Learning NLP Engineers to join their Machine Learning AI – Predictive Analytics team. In this role, you will be responsible for leading improvements in core machine learning and AI-driven products. At any given time, you will be working alongside a team of about 25 other engineers and tasked with up to two projects. Most of the work involves developing data-driven and algorithm-driven models and software products – specifically working with various news feeds. This position will be a contract to permanent onboarding model with benefits offered during the contract phase.


Desired Skills and Experience *

*Must have 3 plus years of work experience after obtaining a Master’s Degree or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or other quantitative fields with a focus on Machine Learning, AI, NLP, Deep Learning and or data driven statistical analysis and modeling

*Previous experience working as an NLP Engineer (Natural Language Processing)

*In depth knowledge of Artificial Intelligence AI and Machine Learning libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Numpy)

*Strong programing skills 5+ years in Python

*Experience developing end-to-end machine learning prototypes


Plusses

*Secondary programming languages (Java, C/C++ R or Scala)

*Big data frameworks (Hadoop
